Articles.Content:
I was wondering if anyone knew of a mod with gimballed SRBs. Or I was wondering if just adding a gimbal module to either the "thumper" or "kickback" config files would do it (not really worried if it has the animation or not). So after searching around, I found this question asked a few times, but no real answers.

What do you guys think?

49 minutes ago, Moarmau5 said:

I was wondering if anyone knew of a mod with gimballed SRBs. Or I was wondering if just adding a gimbal module to either the "thumper" or "kickback" config files would do it (not really worried if it has the animation or not). So after searching around, I found this question asked a few times, but no real answers.

What do you guys think?

Vens stock revamp adds gimbals and makes parts look cool.

Pretty sure that NovaPunch has gimballed SRB's. Hold on, I'll find a link...

 

EDIT: It says 1.0.2, but I find it works fine with 1.0.5, I personally only installed the engines. 

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/3871-102-novapunch-209-may-6th-10-compatibility-update/&page=1

Edited February 5, 2016 by batman78781
Awesome! I'll give those a two a look over. Thanks

You can also add ModuleGimbal (I think that's what it's called) to the SRBs using ModuleManager if so inclined.  Pretty sure Procedural Parts adds gimbals to the procedural SRBs as well, although that may be an RO thing.

Edited February 5, 2016 by regex
